artists.name: Zombie Minions
artists.bio: Zombie Minions was formed by Caleb Cook and Tim During during middle school.  It now consists of Caleb (on Vocals and Guitar) and Brian (on Bass).

artists.name: agentsofmad
artists.bio: agentsofmad is currently a rock single (as opposed to a rock duo or rock trio). The name comes from the classic cartoon show 'Inspector Gadget'. mad doesn't offically stand for anything as far as the show goes, but his son suggested that it stood for 'my asshole dad'.

artists.name: Texar Drive
artists.bio: Texar Drive was formed in 2015. It currently consists of Brian K. Vagnini, playing Bass, Guitar, Keys, Drums, Baritone Uke, Mandolin and Vocals.

artists.name: Brian K. Vagnini
artists.bio: Brian K. Vagnini is a solo artist with a soundtrackish feel to his music.
